title: Ranked Promos Loss
body: I received a loss today when I tried entering a ranked game, I was last pick, and before it was my turn to pick, the enemy didn't choose a champion, their clock was at 0 for an extended amount of time. I was waiting for the client to return me to my queue, rather it gave me a 30 min queue time, and also punished me with a loss in my Silver 3 promos.

replies.body: So you're not going to compensate him for something that was completely not his fault? OK. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Ouch, sorry to hear this resulted in your promo loss. :(

It sounds as if your connection to the champ select timed out due to an unstable or fluctuating connection. I strongly recommend going through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a list of comprehensive steps that should resolve this.

If you run into further issues with this, let me know so we can further troubleshoot this together.
